extendedInfo.description: StarChinese is a fun tool for learning Chinese vocabulary through multiple choice and real audio recordings.This free HSK 1 edition includes all required vocabulary (150 words) required for Level 1, Elementary Chinese.â¢ includes real Mandarin audio recordings of each wordâ¢ uses an intelligent algorithm to review troublesome wordsâ¢ other available versions include vocabulary for all HSK levels - 5000 wordsFrom Wikipedia:The Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi, (simplified Chinese: æ±è¯­æ°´å¹³èè¯; pinyin: HÃ nyÇ ShuÇpÃ­ng KÇoshÃ¬), abbreviated as HSK, is the People's Republic of China's only standardized test of Modern Standard Chinese language proficiency for non-native speakers.kw: study chinese characters, learn chinese characters, learn chinese, study chinese, kanzi, chinese flashcards, flashcards, flash cards, tool, chinois, Chinesisch, ä¸­å½èª, chinese input, chinese chess, chinese keyboard, study chinese,

reviews.title: double choice
reviews.comment: some words have two exactly same choices, but only one of them is the correct answer. So you\'ll need some LUCK to get 100% score
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please increase the volume.
reviews.comment: I like the app, but I cannot hear the words to get the right voice influctions to determine whether it is 1st, 2nd, 3rd or 4th tone. Without properly learning the correct tones, it changes the meaning of the word. Therefore it is critical to fix th end volume within the program. Please allow an adjustable volume within the program.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Yvonne Johnson

reviews.title: Best app by far for learning mandarin and simplified chinese!
reviews.comment: This is the only app with multiple choice testing to match the written and spoken form with a choice of meanings. Also shows characters you get wrong more often. I learned to recognize the entire HSK 1 in 1 night! And bought HSK 2 & 3 immediately. Well worth it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: speak english
reviews.comment: this is a good app. the multiple choice quiz works well. but i wish it would speak the english answers. apart from that great app will buy the rest
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect!
reviews.comment: Probably the best Mandarin learning app out there. All itcs missing is pinyin/english search and more options to adjust quiz difficulty.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sound issues
reviews.comment: Its a good app, but I can barely hear the chinese audio. The volume on my tablet is full blast, and everything else is really loud, is this just me?
reviews.author: jamie loewer

reviews.title: Great app with some rough edges
reviews.comment: A couple words omit pinyin in multiple choice mode (e.g. Daughter in hsk1). Sometimes 2 identical answers are listed as multiple choice options. It would help me if I could reverse multiple choice-i.e. show the English word and 4 mandarin multiple choice answers. Also, I wish the multiple choice would be more similar, e.g. 4 particles or 4 multipart words. Also, I wish the multiple choice answers would only draw from the pool of words in the set. These are all minor/moderate quibbles & this app is great.
reviews.author: David Galt

reviews.title: Changes Needed
reviews.comment: This series would be a lot better with randomized ordering for the words. It makes it too easy to guess the words since many are clumped together by their first letters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app but the links to other levels do not work! Why not just place all the other levels on the shop so that they can be searched and purchased as required?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app, but dont flip your phone...
reviews.comment: Otherwise your progress score will reset. Otherwise a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Im taking a beginners chinese class so i can help quiz myself to remember the pinyin a little better. But i have only had this app for two minutes, and it has already force closed TWICE!! NEEDS SOME SERIOUS IMPROVEMENT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app to learn chinese
reviews.comment: It\'s the best app to learn chinese characters and very quickly. I bought level 2 and 3

reviews.comment: Very helpful

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Need to eliminate 2 similar choices appearing for the multiple choice (try clicking the lower option when that happen), \345\260\217\345\247\220 can also mean a hooker but that wasn\'t mentioned, but generally good app. Not bought higher levels
